@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
attributes.name: Pausable

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
attributes.name: whenNotPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
attributes.name: whenPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.documentation:
@title Crowdsale
@dev Crowdsale is a base contract for managing a token crowdsale,
allowing investors to purchase tokens with ether. This contract implements
such functionality in its most fundamental form and can be extended to provide additional
functionality and/or custom behavior.
The external interface represents the basic interface for purchasing tokens, and conform
the base architecture for crowdsales. They are *not* intended to be modified / overridden.
The internal interface conforms the extensible and modifiable surface of crowdsales. Override
the methods to add functionality. Consider using 'super' where appropriate to concatenate
behavior.
attributes.name: Crowdsale
TokenPurchase

attributes.documentation: @dev fallback function ***DO NOT OVERRIDE***

@dev low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE***
@param _beneficiary Address performing the token purchase
attributes.name: buyTokens
_preValidatePurchase
_postValidatePurchase
_deliverTokens
_processPurchase
_updatePurchasingState
_getTokenAmount

attributes.documentation: @dev Determines how ETH is stored/forwarded on purchases.
